content: the stitch on your right hand needle knit this stitch you ve just chained 1 stitch repeat this 2 more times for a total of 3 times work the next decrease on the chart a sl2k1psso you now have 2 stitches on your right hand needle cast off one stitch by passing the rightmost stitch over and off the needle chain 5 place bead and chain 4 if you d like to omit the beads simply chain 9 once you have a 9 stitch chain with or without bead work the next decrease on the chart cast off 1 stitch and begin the next chain continue to work the bind off row in this manner finishing sew in any ends soak and block to emphasize the curving lines of the leafy edge pin out the longer beaded chains individually and do not pin the shorter chains stockinette haruni © emily ross page 3 of 9 legend legend no stitch $ placeholder - no stitch made slip c slip_stitch as if to purl holding yarn in back k ` knit yo k yarn over ssk ည slip one stitch as if to knit slip another stitch as if to knit insert left-hand needle into front of these 2 stitches and knit them together k2tog v knit two stitches together as one stitch sl2k1psso h slip first and second stitches together as if to knit knit 1 stitch pass two slipped stitches over the knit stitch place bead b place bead knit if omitting beads simply knit on first time per half ssk all other repeats sl2 k1 psso on first time per half ssk on all repeats sl2 k1 psso sl2 k1 psso on final repeat of each half k2tog ဂ sl2 k1 psso on final repeat of each half k2tog k4tog ဟ knit four stitches together as one stockinette haruni © emily ross page 4 of 9 a trahc 3 3 3 5 4 5 4 5 4 5 4 5 4 5 4 b b b b b b 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 01 11 21 31 41 51 61 71 81 91 02 12 22 32 42 52 62 72 82 92 03 13 23 33 43 53 63 73 83 93 04 14 24 34 44 54 64 74 84 94 05 15 25 35 ဟ h h h h h h h h ဟ 92 c ` ည k ည ` v k v k v k v k ` k ည k ည k ည k ည ` v k h k k v ` ` 72 c ` ည k ည ` ` ` v k v k v k ` ` ` k ည k ည k ည ` ` ` v k h k k v ` ` 52 c ` ည k ည ` ` ` ` ` v k v k v k ` k ည k ည k ည ` ` ` ` `
